text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――OK! With this, the fabric order is complete. All that's left is to sell sell sell at the meeting♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: But well, maybe it's about time I replace my laptop? To think it'd suddenly cut-out……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Anyways, it's a good thing I was able to borrow one from the company today!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――That's it! Because I was using a different computer from normal……! I typed the wrong number……? Aaaah, no matter how I look at it, there's an extra zero……!
It was hard to believe she'd make such a simple mistake. This girl who was excellent at everything……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Kuu……it happened again……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: No, it's nothing. Anyways……I need to think of a solution quickly……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely turn this around. This kind of pinch is nothing.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Rather, it's times like these that you have to get it done!
The gaze in her eyes was serious. Even though I was worried, she wasn't discouraged in the least. I was surprised with how quickly she changed gears.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Alright, it's going to get busy!
And so, Satono Crown once again put her all in to running――!

text_block_list.name: Company Staff A
text_block_list.text: Using the extra fabric to make ready-made suits……I see. However, we've already set a date to finalize our plans for sales at the meeting……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: That has already been taken in to account! Please look over these documents for more details. With this plan, we should still be in the black.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I can't stand having the company take a hit due to my mistake. I'll definitely make up for it. So please……let me do it!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ――Ooooh, modeling formal wear for a collab……is it? Sounds fun, doesn't it? I'll try asking Managee.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much! Once it's finished, we'll give you a set. Also, I'd like to do a photo shoot as well……

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Here here~, let's take the cute ones and upload them to Umasta♪ Curren will really spread the word!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Is that so?……No it's fine, it was a sudden request after all. Yes……Yes……Well then, sorry to bother you.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Aiyah, I guess this person couldn't help either~! Are there any other designers that would do this……!?

text_block_list.name: Fabric Craftsman
text_block_list.text: Delivery by this date……!? My business motto is 『Meticulous』 though……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I'm begging you! I can't ask a place that relies only on speed. I'll include expediency fees……so how does this sound!?

text_block_list.name: Crown's Classmate
text_block_list.text: Hey heeey, Crown, I heard about that meeting on Umasta! That was really cool though, that suit had such a chic feel to it.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……! Didn't it? Definitely come take a look!
The new project proceeded on quickly. From an outsider's perspective, her work was almost like magic……!
choice_data_list: Is there anything I can help with?
Is there anything I can help with?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Thanks. But your support is more than enough. Rather, I'm the one that should apologize for suddenly being so busy.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: But that all ends tomorrow…… Yeah, this time it's perfect……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: The meeting tomorrow will definitely be a success! Thanks for your help. Well then, we're finished for today. Good night.
Once again she was working late. This time it would be perfect. But on the other hand, in regards to her training……
It was unlikely that she hadn't realized that. But she still tried her best without complaint.
Her excellence and her dedication were the real deal. In that case, times like these were when she would need support……
――And then, the day of the meeting. The venue was packed……! Both order-made and ready-made products sold like crazy.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Thanks for coming! ……We did it. My plan was a complete success!

text_block_list.name: Company Staff A
text_block_list.text: Sales are several times higher than projected! As expected of the young lady.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It thanks to you for letting me take on that challenge! ……Oh, it's just about time for a break, isn't it? I'm going to step away for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Huuu……I'm really glad I was able to fix things. It's finally almost over, huh……But……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ――Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Maybe……I was a bit naive. That girl, she's putting everything in to it.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Trainer……! Ahaha……Guess there's no point in whining about it, huh? No problem……I'll definitely be able to turn things around.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: There isn't much time, but I'll do everything that I can. After all, starting today I can focus solely on training……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Eh……is that……? Let me see it……!
Now, I want to support her. With that thought in mind, I spent all of last night creating a new training menu.
Even if there wasn't time, there was always something that you could do. I analyzed her past data and race footage as much as I could……
I created a training menu tailored to her nature and effective even if she only had a short amount of time.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Um……changing the current training menu to a more time efficient method? Including meal management…… taking in to consideration my likes and dislikes……!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I'm surprised you researched this much…… With something like this, I feel like it would work out……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: How perceptive…… You're……pretty good, huh!?
choice_data_list: So you think this is worthwhile?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It'll depend on results. However……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I want to believe in your passion and abilities……! I've just got a feeling that with this, things will be completely different!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Fufufufufuu! Thank you, Trainer. It's a great help.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's go turn this around! ――I'm confident!
